message: I know you're still in training, but still. I commend Fanamor for that. Her work is exemplary; we can learn a lot from her.
That didn't work. My wounds are too deep.

replies.text: Oh dear, wait, I'll get something different.

message: [Rolls eyes] You're pretty useless. Look in my bag there.

replies.text: Indeed! Here's a bottle of healing potion! And there's also...

message: Leave my bag alone and finally give me the healing potion!!

replies.text: Oh, yes, of course ... Here you go.

message: Ahh, that's good. A little faster next time, kid.
